title: Can wisdom be found outside the Bible and Christianity? - Quora

response.answer_text: Define wisdom!! Human wisdom allegedly comes with age eg Wisdom teeth. however we all know the expression there is no fool like an old fool. Real wisdom to Christians is different. “The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom”. Fear means awe not terror. I believe wisdom comes from god. God alone. Jesus reveals god and his Holy Spirit within me renews my mind. Paul wrote “the crucifixion is blasphemy to the Jews and folly to the Greeks”: meaning, today, offensive to the religious and foolish to the educated, or worldly wise. so I don’t expect anyone to agree with me and philosophers will think we are stupid but I believe true wisdom comes from god, and is found in his word: the Bible is the written word, Jesus is the word made flesh and the holy spirit writes his word on our hearts. Take it or leave it, accept it or reject it; the honest should at least explore it for themselves.

Are you saying that all the other religions and those who believe in those religions are unwise? What an absurd question. What about all those who are logical, reasonable, rational, skeptical and therefore wise who don’t believe in any gods? Of course wisdom can be found outside the bible and Christianity. The Bible is just a collection of books written in the Bronze Age!

Absolutely. In fact more rationality and wisdom can be found by atheists. The Bible, Christianity and Religion in general blocks mental development. So, you are better off not following any of their guidelines.

Yes, but not nearly as much. Nothing compares to Proverbs for practical wisdom. Take God out of the picture and you lose most of what wisdom has for you. Proverbs 9:10 ESV The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom, and the knowledge of the Holy One is insight.
Yes wisdom can be found outside the Bible and Christianity. But only the Bible tells one how to avoid hell and gain eternal life in heaven.

The Bible itself implies that Wisdom cries in the marketplace every day and that is neither in the Bible itself nor in Christianity but everywhere there are people. The Divine does not leave people bereft of wisdom.

Let us say that there is wisdom in the bible. How came the wisdom into the bible? Answer; by people who did not have a bible. The bible is a product of Judaism and Christianity. It is not the source or base. The religions are older than the scriptures.
“Can wisdom be found outside the Bible and Christianity?” Most certainly. No religion or their holy book have a monopoly on wisdom.
Of course. But ultimately wisdom without God is fruitless. Once you understand that transcends all things. You are able to have a much better grasp of the world.
Though spiritual wisdom is deeper practical wisdom can be found outside the Bible..
The Bible is not the source of wisdom. Wisdom is older than religion, wisdom is older than God‘s, wisdom came from life experience.
Wisdom is knowing God almighty is the only one true God And wisdom true wisdom is to fear the lord. Otherwise you are the fool
